name: smartOne Prepaid, TSYS
description: Prepaid Cards for Business by TSYS
tag_list: smartone, incentive-card, pay-card, payroll-card, visa-prepaid-card, mastercard-prepaid-card
overview:
smartOne® Prepaid offers industry leading prepaid Corporate Award and Payroll Cards. Whether you are looking to influence employee and customer behavior with the Corporate Award Card or streamline payroll with the Payroll Card, smartOne Prepaid cards are: • Easy to order online • Works like a debit card, in store, over the phone or online • Can be used anywhere Visa® or MasterCard® debit cards are accepted • Safe and secure with Visa or MasterCard Zero Liability Policies

smartOne, a division of TSYS, offers end-to-end service programs specifically for small and mid-sized businesses, backed by powerful technology and extensive market experience. TSYS has been influential in educating consumers about the power of prepaid and guiding clients to optimize their prepaid programs. As a full program management provider smartOne supports distributors as well as marketing and promotional companies with: • Exceptional speed to market with our easy ordering process • Fully customized programs and card designs • Simple and competitive pricing models for their internal and external clients
